textBeforeTable: Check out the full lineup below: From Killzone Shadow Fall and Knack on PS4, to Gran Turismo 6 and Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag on PS3, to Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition on PS Vita, the January Flash Sale is stocked with plenty of exciting games with some great discounts. It’s time for more discounts on some top PS4, PS3 and PS Vita games. Get up to 50% off a great lineup of titles starting right now. If you think you might pick one (or two, or three, or four) of the games on sale, act fast, because this Flash Sale ends at 6:00PM Pacific on Friday, January 31st. } background: #d3e5f8; { tr:nth-child(odd) } background: #e5f1fd; { tr:nth-child(even) } text-align: center; font-size: 14px; { th } text-align: center; border: 5px solid #3e6fa3; margin-top: 20px; margin: auto; width: 85%; { table
